mita amatharawa widuhalpathiwarungen sadumlath kamituwak pathkota pawathna prayogika gatalu pilibanda dirgha washayen sakachcha kota, pasal winaya aaraksha kirima wenuwen madihathwiya haki kalina yojana athulath warthawak sathiyak athulatha thama wetha labadena lesath amathyawaraya mehidi upades laba dunneya.ko/aananda widyalaya, ko/nalanda widyalaya, ko/di es senanayaka widyalaya, ko/rajakiya widyalaya, ko/tharstan widyalaya, moratuwa welskumara widyalaya, moratuwa shantha sebasthiyan widyalaya, ko/mahanama widyalaya, kalaniya shri dharmaloka widyalaya, ko/isipathana widyalaya, galkissa shantha thomas widyalaya athulu pasal kihipayaka widuhalpathiwarun saha niyojya widuhalpathiwarun menma adhyapana amathyanshaye athireka lekam(gunathmaka sanwardhana) aacharya madhura wehalla, athireka lekam (adhyapana sewa) hemantha premathilaka athulu niladharin pirisak mema awasthawata sahabhagi wiya.

nithipathi melesa upades di aththe aththe pahadiliwa naduwak gonu kala haki chodanawakini.

pasugiya badada (16) janatha wimukthi peramune deshapalana mandalaya palawaththa karyalayedi raswuna.

parlimenthu manthriwarun sandaha thiru badu rahitha wahana balapathra labadima wahama athhituwannayi illa shreshtadhikaranayata eeye mulika ayithiwasikam pethsamak gonu keruna.nithignyawarayeku wisin gonu kala mema pethsamen penwa denne manthriwarun sandaha thiru badu rahitha wahana balapathra nikuth kirima haraha rajayata wishala paduwak siduwana bawayi.ee anuwa adala balapathra nikuth kirima athhituwana lesayi pethsamkaru shreshtadhikaranayen illa aththe.me athara, ikuth janadhipathiwaranayedi eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaye deshapalana katayuthu sandaha lanka gamanagamana mandalaye bas ratha yoda ganima hethuwen siduwu rupiyal miliyana 140kata wadi paduwa aya kara dena lesa illa gonu kara athi naduwa salaka balima kolambaa wanija mahadhikaranaya eeye kal damuwa.mema naduwe wagauththarakaruwan lesa hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha, eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaye hitapu mahalekam susil premajayantha athulu pirisak nam kara thibenawa.naduwa kadawu awasthawedi pethsamkara parshawaya kiya sitiye eeta adala sanshodhitha paminillak idiripath kirimata awasara labadena lesayi.
